description: This stop is mentioned only lists of stopnames in Irwin's entries for Musette and Regal. We can only assume that it is a Regal with brass resonators, or one with brass-like tone. Could it be that Irwin invented the term by translating Messingregal into English? Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Musette, Regal FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only. BrassRegal.html - Last updated 10 March 2000. Home Full Index
